segments.text: Oh , my god . How can you stand living in such a messy dorm ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our place is spotlessly clean , compared with others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you even tried to clean it once since you moved in at the beginning of the semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In fact , I just swept the floor three days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we need to restart the dormitory sanitation inspection system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet nobody will care about it .
segments.speaker: S2
